skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Habitat HomeLink Skill

This skill helps in discovering the Habitat devices and controlling their setpoints and thermostat mode.
User will need to use Alexa App(US) and login with their registered Habitat account to discover their thermostat. Once discover is successful, user will be able to control their setpoints and mode via the Alexa App.

For more information regarding Alexa Commands, please visit www.habitattechnologies.com and look for "Amazon Alexa Functions" under the Documents tab.
